snippet: The president said Mr. Trump should reach out to voters alienated by his campaign, and declined to comment on the selection of Stephen K. Bannon as senior counselor....
lead_paragraph: The president said Mr. Trump should reach out to voters alienated by his campaign, and declined to comment on the selection of Stephen K. Bannon as senior counselor.

headline.main: Obama Urges Donald Trump to Send ‘Signals of Unity’ to Minority Groups and Women
